---
title: Process Attachment
---

```typescript
import { whopApi } from "@/lib/whop-api";

const result = await whopApi.processAttachment({
	// Autogenerated input type of AnalyzeAttachment
	input: {
		// The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.
		directUploadId: "Error" /* Required! */,
		mediaType:
			"audio" /* Valid values: audio | image | other | video */ /* Required! */,
		multipartParts: [
			{
				// The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.
				etag: "Error" /* Required! */,
				// The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.
				partNumber: "Error" /* Required! */,
			},
		],
		// The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.
		multipartUploadId: "Error",
	},
});

```
